text: Aey ehal-e-kitab! Jo kuch hum ney nazil farmaya hai jo uss ki bhi tasdeeq kerney wala hai jo tumharay pass hai iss per eman lao iss say pehlay hum chehray bigaar den aur enhen lota ker peeth ki taraf ker den ya inn per laanat bhejen jaisay hum ney haftay kay din walon per laanat ki aur hai Allah Taalaa ka kaam kiya gaya
